Healthy.cure: No treatment required. Maintain optimal watering and fertilization.
Healthy.growth_tips: Ensure proper sunlight and regular pruning for better growth.

Powdery Mildew.cure: Use fungicides containing sulfur or neem oil. Remove affected leaves.
Powdery Mildew.growth_tips: Ensure proper air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

Rust.cure: Apply copper-based fungicides. Remove infected leaves to prevent spread.
Rust.growth_tips: Plant resistant varieties and maintain proper spacing.

Leaf Spot.cure: Use fungicidal sprays and remove infected leaves promptly.
Leaf Spot.growth_tips: Water plants at the base and avoid wetting the leaves.

Blight.cure: Apply a copper fungicide and remove infected plant parts.
Blight.growth_tips: Rotate crops and avoid planting in the same soil yearly.

Bacterial Wilt.cure: Remove and destroy affected plants. Use resistant varieties.
Bacterial Wilt.growth_tips: Ensure proper soil drainage and avoid overwatering.

Early Blight.growth_tips: Mulch around plants to prevent soil splash.

Late Blight.cure: Use fungicides like Mancozeb. Destroy infected plants immediately.
Late Blight.growth_tips: Avoid excessive moisture and ensure good air circulation.

Downy Mildew.cure: Apply fungicides like metalaxyl or copper-based sprays.
Downy Mildew.growth_tips: Ensure good air movement and reduce humidity around plants.

Anthracnose.cure: Use a fungicide with azoxystrobin. Remove infected plant debris.
Anthracnose.growth_tips: Practice crop rotation and avoid overhead watering.

Cercospora Leaf Spot.cure: Apply neem oil or copper fungicides.
Cercospora Leaf Spot.growth_tips: Improve soil drainage and reduce plant stress.

Mosaic Virus.cure: No chemical cure. Remove and destroy infected plants.
Mosaic Virus.growth_tips: Control aphids and other pests that spread the virus.

Fusarium Wilt.cure: Use fungicides containing thiophanate-methyl. Rotate crops.
Fusarium Wilt.growth_tips: Improve soil health and avoid planting in contaminated areas.

Verticillium Wilt.cure: No effective treatment. Remove infected plants and improve soil.
Verticillium Wilt.growth_tips: Use disease-resistant varieties and improve soil aeration.

Black Rot.cure: Apply copper fungicides and remove affected leaves.
Black Rot.growth_tips: Use disease-free seeds and avoid overhead watering.

Alternaria Leaf Spot.cure: Apply fungicides with chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Alternaria Leaf Spot.growth_tips: Avoid prolonged leaf wetness and improve air circulation.

Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.cure: No cure available. Remove infected plants to prevent spread.
Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.growth_tips: Control whiteflies as they spread the virus.

Brown Spot.cure: Use copper-based fungicides and remove infected leaves.
Brown Spot.growth_tips: Ensure good drainage and avoid overhead irrigation.

Scab.cure: Apply fungicides containing sulfur or captan.
Scab.growth_tips: Use resistant plant varieties and prune regularly.

Septoria Leaf Spot.cure: Use fungicides with chlorothalonil or copper compounds.
Septoria Leaf Spot.growth_tips: Avoid excessive nitrogen fertilization and water at the base.

Bacterial Leaf Blight.cure: Apply copper-based sprays and remove infected plants.
Bacterial Leaf Blight.growth_tips: Ensure proper plant spacing and avoid high humidity.

Sooty Mold.cure: Control the insects that cause mold buildup (e.g., aphids, whiteflies).
Sooty Mold.growth_tips: Use insecticidal soap and keep plants clean from honeydew.

Leaf Curl.cure: Apply fungicides before bud break, such as Bordeaux mixture.
Leaf Curl.growth_tips: Use disease-resistant varieties and prune infected areas.

White Mold.cure: Apply fungicides like thiophanate-methyl and remove affected plants.
White Mold.growth_tips: Improve soil drainage and avoid excessive moisture.

Gray Mold.cure: Use fungicides like iprodione or thiophanate-methyl.
Gray Mold.growth_tips: Increase airflow and remove dead plant material.
